title: Red Velvet Cake Recipe
title_page: Red Velvet Cake Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This is a cake to stop traffic. The layers are an improbable red that can vary from a fluorescent pink to a dark ruddy mahogany. The color, often enhanced by buckets of food coloring, becomes even more eye-catching set against clouds of snowy icing, like a slash of glossy lipstick framed by platinum blond curls. Even the name has a vampy allure: red velvet. These days this Southern favorite is found in just about every bakery, but perhaps for a special occasion (like the very red and white Valentineâ€™s Day) you could try your hand at baking it.
Featured in: So Naughty, So Nice.
Learn: How to Frost a Cake
